name: SUPER SPEED: Mini Monsters
description:
Controls

Z - Attack

X - Throw monster catching ball

[J, K, L] - Swap between your monsters

How To Play
  • Enemy monsters must be at 1HP (red health bar) to be caught
  • Attacks with a super effective elemental effect will instantly reduce the enemies health to 1, or if they are already at 1 kill them
  • All other attacks do 1 damage
  • Catch monsters to gain gold
  • Spend gold to upgrade the health of your own monsters
  • Enemies will get stronger as the combat round goes on, so...
make sure to take advantage of elemental damage!!!
  • Water beats Fire
  • Fire beats Grass
  • Grass beats Water
